pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pulls the Covid-19 Data from the New York Times Public Data Source // Accesses the NY Times Covid-19 county-level data for the US, described in https://www.nytimes.com/article/coronavirus-county-data-us.html and available at https://github.com/nytimes/covid-19-data. It then returns the data in a tidy data format according to the Covid19R Project data specification. If you plan to use the data or publicly display the data or results, please make sure cite the original NY Times source. Please read and follow the terms laid out in the data license at https://github.com/nytimes/covid-19-data/blob/master/LICENSE.
